properties.name: server.servlet.api.path.global-prefix
properties.description: 专门针对 Controller层接口路径前缀全局配置.

properties.name: spring.cache-conf.prefix
properties.description: 缓存配置项 前缀.

properties.name: spring.cache.enable
properties.description: 是否启用本地缓存 (默认不启用， 如果业务对于缓存依赖较高可启用本地缓存作为一级缓存).

properties.name: knife4j.basic.enable
properties.description: knife4j 开启Swagger的Basic认证功能,默认是false.

properties.name: knife4j.basic.username
properties.description: knife4j Basic认证用户名.

properties.name: knife4j.basic.password
properties.description: knife4j Basic认证密码.

properties.name: knife4j.production
properties.description: knife4j 是否生产环境 （生产环境默认屏蔽文档）.

properties.name: log.path
properties.description: 日志存储地址.

properties.name: xc-cloud.system-name
properties.description: 系统名称.

properties.name: xc-cloud.system-starter-time
properties.description: 系统启动时间 为空则默认 真实当前系统启动时间.

properties.name: xc-cloud.web.upload-path
properties.description: Web 上传地址.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.default-pass
properties.description: 认证类 默认密码 (密码至少包含大小写字母，数字，且不少于6位).

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.token.secret
properties.description: 认证类 Token 盐值.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.token.effective-time
properties.description: 认证类 Token 有效时间.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.token.tokenHeader
properties.description: Authorization.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.token.tokenHead
properties.description: Bearer.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.login.limit-count
properties.description: 限制登录数量 -1 为无限大.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.login.limit-refuse
properties.description: 限制登录拒绝策略 after为后者 before为前者.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.login.slip-count
properties.description: 认证类 登录 失败次数.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.login.slip-verify-count
properties.description: 认证类 登录 失败N次后弹出验证码 （超过验证码阈值 弹出验证码）.

properties.name: xc-cloud.auth.login.slip-lock-speed
properties.description: 认证类 登录 失败锁定时间(秒).

properties.name: xc-cloud.excel.export-max-count
properties.description: Excel 导出最大操作数.
